ultraeffects.midnightconfig.title: Ultra Effects
ultraeffects.midnightconfig.parryFlashTi: The amount of ticks the flash effect should be displayed.
ultraeffects.midnightconfig.parryFreezeT: The amount of ticks the screen should freeze for when performing parries and whatnot.
The images that should be used for flashes. §cMust §rbe §a.png §rfiles and put under §aultraeffects/assets/textures/misc/§r.
ultraeffects.midnightconfig.gabrielImage: The images that should be used as overlayS. §cMust §rbe §a.png §rfiles and put under §aultraeffects/assets/textures/misc/§r.
ultraeffects.midnightconfig.gabrielThres: The threshold of health you have to have left before gabriel starts appearing on your screen.
ultraeffects.midnightconfig.gabrielWaitT: The amount of ticks to wait before displaying the next image.
ultraeffects.midnightconfig.gabrielFlash: The amount of ticks to flash the image of Gabriel on your screen.
